description.value: A Blade of Ilneval is touched by the orc god Ilneval, and is exceptionally fast. The blood of the orc can be used to tap into the creature's speed. Alchemists often look for this blood to create various potions. Use: A creature may spend an action to drink this blood. For the next 10 minutes, the creatures has double its movement speed. This ability does not work for elves and half-elves.
